attributes.action: Step in to secure funding for Wildwalk in Bristol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Wildwalk centre in Bristol is due to close in April this year. In a time when the education of both adults and children in matters relating to our environment is paramount, the loss of this important resource sends a message to everyone that we don't really care about our world.

With Bristol hoping to become a 'green capital' in the UK, this centre together with the many events centred around it is a vital tool for our continued efforts in enviromental conservation.
